basics.name: Stathis Moraitidis
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am a Senior/Lead Software Engineer with more than 10 years of experience and a backend and full stack focus. For the past few years I've worked mostly at startups so I am used to wearing many hats. I care deeply about building elegant and maintainable solutions, while keeping a great user and developer experience in mind.

highlights: Responsible for the automated monthly delivery of content to partners. This involved a combination of GAE, GCE, Cloud Tasks, etc.
Owned all server-mobile APIs. I was the point of contact for existing implementations as well as all new development in the area.
Implemented integrations around user login flows (e.g. Apple Sign In).
Facilitated team processes, worked towards enhancing developer experience and tackling technical debt.
Implemented various features across the companyâ€™s stack and products. Technologies mostly used were Python, JavaScript, React, PostgreSQL and AWS.
Overviewed larger-scale projects, keeping track of progress and feeding back to product team.
Helped more junior members of the team with their everyday queries.
Conducted interviews for development and product teams.
Helped in shaping and organising some of the team's processes.
Implemented new functionality, enhancements and fixes, using C++, C, Microsoft SQL Server.
Participated actively in meetings with product owners and managers during the planning process.
Created a tool that unifies all developers' internal programs, making them easily accessible.
Implemented a regression test framework for testing various products across the company. I was keeping track of new requests, resolving issues or assigning them to other team members.
Ported a process (~8k lines) from Java to C++.
Extended an existing web-based tool for testing market trading.

projects.name: Bit Pong
projects.description: A mobile and web game, built in JavaScript.
